title: Verify: Selecting MLB.TV app icon successfully opens the MLB.TV AppleTV app
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the AppleTV device is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Device is connected to wireless network
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the AppleTV device is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Wired connection is connected to device
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify tab menu categories display as expected when logged out
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is not logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the app loads AND the Main Menu appears
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the following:

ON THE LEFT:
MLB teams' logos carousel traverses

ON THE RIGHT:

Today's Games
Standings 
Game Recaps
Team By Team
Sign in with MLB.tv 
Settings

title: Verify tab menu categories display as expected when logged in
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the app loads AND the Main Menu appears
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the following:

ON THE LEFT:
MLB teams' logos carousel traverses

ON THE RIGHT:

Today's Games
Standings 
Game Recaps
Team By Team
Settings

title: Verify when launching the app, the default highlighted option is "Today's Games"
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps:
1. Restart Apple TV device
2. Launch the MLB.TV app
custom_expected: Today's Games is the highlighted option.

title: Today game tile navigation does not loop
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps:
1. Launch the app
2. Select Today's Games 
3. Select a date with multiple games
4. Scroll up from the first game
5. Scroll down from the last game
custom_expected: THEN the navigation does not loop; top to bottom/bottom to top

title: Verify that the Today's Game schedule goes back to the beginning of the season
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps:
1. Select Today's games 
2. Press left d-pad and hold, allowing the schedule to navigate to the very first available date in schedule 
3. Observe date
custom_expected: Day schedule should display the first game of the Spring Training for the current year.

title: Verify Standings pages
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps:
1. Launch app
2. Open Standings
3. Use Right d-pad to scroll through each page of Standings
custom_expected:
Each League is displayed 1 per page, with the next page partially visible. 
Each page is displayed with Team's logo and season stats
Verify sorting is by PCT top to bottom
American League East teams: NYY, TB, BOS, TOR, BAL
American League Central teams: MIN, CLE, CWS, KC, DET
American League West: HOU, OAK, TEX, LAA, SEA
National League East: ATL, WSH, NYM, PHI, MIA
National League Central: STL, MIL, CHC, CIN, PIT
National League West: LAD, ARI, SF, COL, SD

title: Verify Game Recaps Page
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps:
1. Launch the App
2. Select Game Recaps
custom_expected:
Game Recaps are displayed.
Verify top date is date of last games played, and sorted vertically in reverse chronological order
Each Game shows Final Score

title: Any user is able to watch Game Recaps
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is not logged in
custom_steps:
1. Launch App
2. Select Game Recaps
3. Select a Game Recap
custom_expected: Game Recap should play

title: Moving forward and back through game Recaps Milestones
custom_preconds: Game Recap is playing
custom_steps:
1. Press the down d-pad 
2. Observe the Milestone bar appears
3. Press right d-pad
4. Observe the Recap moves forward to the next Milestone
5. Press the left d-pad
6. Observe the Recap moves to the previous Milestone
custom_expected: Navigation should move game recap as expected.

title: Scrubbing forward and back through Game Recaps
custom_preconds: Game Recap is playing
custom_steps:
1. Press the right d-pad 
2. Observe the Game Recap fast forwards up to 3x speed
3. Press the left d-pad
4. Observe the Recap rewinds up to 3x speed
custom_expected: Navigation should move Game Recap as expected.

title: Verify Team by Team list - All teams display on sub-menu page
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps:
1. Launch App
2. Select Team By Team
custom_expected: All teams display -under their league's header -name displays without typos or any formatting issues -logo is correct and displays without issue note: favorited team will be sorted to the beginning of the league list *American League* Baltimore Orioles Boston Red Sox Chicago White Sox Cleveland Indians Detroit Tigers Houston Astros Kansas City Royals Los Angeles Angels Minnesota Twins New York Yankees Oakland Athletics Seattle Mariners Tampa Bay Rays Texas Rangers Toronto Blue Jays *National League* Arizona Diamondbacks Atlanta Braves Chicago Cubs Cincinnati Reds Colorado Rockies Los Angeles Dodgers Miami Marlins Milwaukee Brewers New York Mets Philadephia Phillies Pittsburgh Pirates San Diego Padres San Francisco Giants St. Louis Cardinals Washington Nationals

title: When a Favorite Team is selected, a star appears next to the Team's Logo
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Logged in User has followed teams
custom_steps: Select Team By Team
custom_expected: User's followed teams show at the beginning of the list per League, and there is a Star next to the team logo

title: Verify Team Selected Page
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
App is launched
Team By Team is selected
custom_steps: When a team is selected
custom_expected:
Team name is displayed at the top
Team's W/L record is displayed under the team name
User can navigate to "recent", "upcoming", and previous season games
User can Follow / Unfollow team
Games are listed by Date

title: Non-logged in User selecting a Favorite a team
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is not logged in
custom_steps:
1. Launch app
2. Select Team By Team
3. Select a team
4. Select Follow
custom_expected: User is invited to Log in to an MLB.TV account

title: Logged in User is able to select a favorite team
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is logged in
custom_steps:
1. Launch app
2. Select Team By Team
3. Select a team
4. Select Follow
custom_expected: "Follow" changes to "Unfollow"

title: User is able to unselect a favorite team
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Logged in User has followed teams
custom_steps:
1. Launch app
2. Select Team By Team
3. Select a Followed team
4. Select Unfollow
custom_expected: "Unfollow" changes to "Follow"

title: Sign in screen
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is not logged in
custom_steps:
1. Launch App
2. Select Sign in with MLB.TV
custom_expected:
Log In is displayed at the top.
Message says "Log in to watch more baseball.  If you do not have a MLB.TV account, go to www.mlb.com/appletv to create one on your computer."
MLB.TV Subscriber Login  button is selected.

title: Verify still logged in after exiting and re-entering the app
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is logged in
custom_steps:
1.  Press the Menu button to Exit the app and return to the AppleTV menu screen
2.  Launch the app
custom_expected: Verify user is still logged in

title: Verify All available Settings options are visible and accessible in the sub-menu display
custom_preconds: MLB.TV App is available on device
custom_steps:
1. Select Settings
2. Scroll through all buttons
custom_expected:
- Log In to MLB.TV / Log Out

- Hide Spoilers (only appears when logged in)

- App Version
--Correct App version should be displayed
- Terms of Service 
-- Verify the links for Terms of Service and Privacy Policy are displayed properly

title: Sign In Failure
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is not logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Settings
2. Select Log in to MLB.TV
3. Select MBL.TV Subscriber Login
4. Login with incorrect credentials
custom_expected: Observe error message: "Login Failure" is displayed at the top of the screen.  The next line shows "There was a problem. Please try again.  Contact support if this problem persists."  Followed with an OK button

title: Sign In Success
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is not logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Settings
2. Select Log in to MLB.TV
3. Select MBL.TV Subscriber Login
4. Login with valid credentials
custom_expected:
Observe Login screen with "Authorizing" shown with a spinner
User is returned to the Settings page when login is Successful
"Log in to MLB.TV" is now replaced with "Log Out" and the email address used to log in
"Hide Spoilers" now appears (and is set according to the credentials used.  ie if Spoilers were on for that account then they "On" should be the current setting.)

title: Verify Log-Out sub-menu functionality (from Settings Menu)
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Settings is selected
custom_steps: Select Log Out
custom_expected:
User is logged out and returned to the Main Screen
Verify Sign in with MLB.TV is displayed

title: Verify Spoilers (Hide/Show Scores) functionality
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is logged in and Hide Spoilers is turned On
custom_steps:
1. Select Today's Games
2. Move to a previous day
3. Observe the Box Scores are empty for any Game marked as Final
4. Go Back and select Team by Team
5. Select any team
6. Highlight any previous game
7. Observe the Box Scores are empty
custom_expected: Scores should not be visible in "Team by Team" or "Today's Games"

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User not logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Sign in with MOB.TV
2. Enter the Free MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: User is able to Log in

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD Live/VOD archive
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Free User is logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Today's Games
2. Select the FGOTD
3. Press to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: Selected Video will then start

title: Non-FGOTD Gameday Sign-in Notification for Free User/Non-Entitlement account
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Free User is logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Today's Games
2. User Selects the Non-FGOTD
3. Press to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: Game is not clickable

title: Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Monthly Premium User is logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Today's Games
2. Select any Video (either Live or VOD)
custom_expected: Video playback begins

title: Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Annual Premium User is logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Today's Games
2. Select any Video (either Live or VOD)
custom_expected: Video playback starts.

title: Single Team Account Entitlement is allowed to play All Live/VOD games for the team associated with said account

MLB.TV App is available on device

custom_steps:

2. Select Team associated with the logged in account
3. Select any Video (either Live or VOD)
custom_expected: Video playback begins

title: Single Team Account Entitlement is not allowed to play All Live/VOD games for the team associated with said account
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Single Team User is logged in
custom_steps:
1. Select Team by Team
2. Select Team NOT associated with the logged in account
3. Select any Video (either Live or VOD)
custom_expected: "Subscription Required" message is shown

title: Full VOD Archive Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Device is connected to wireless network
User is logged in
custom_steps:
Select Today's Games
Select any VOD Game
Watch to completion
custom_expected: THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page **Very good chance this will fail: https://jira.bamtechmedia.com/browse/MLBTVATV-739 - [Playback] App crashes back out to device menu after completion of VOD/Live Playback.

title: Verify CC during VOD game
custom_preconds: MLB.TV is available on device
custom_steps:
1.  Select a VOD game
2.  Long press on Select to bring up Playback features
3.  Select Closed Caption and turn it on
custom_expected: Closed Caption should begin during game playback.

title: Full Live Game Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Device is connected to wireless network
User is logged in
custom_steps:
Select Today's Games
Select any Live Game
Watch to completion
custom_expected: THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page **Very good chance this will fail: https://jira.bamtechmedia.com/browse/MLBTVATV-739 - [Playback] App crashes back out to device menu after completion of VOD/Live Playback.

title: Verify CC during Live game
custom_preconds: MLB.TV is available on device
custom_steps:
1.  Select a Live game
2.  Long press on Select to bring up Playback features
3.  Select Closed Caption and turn it on
custom_expected: Closed Caption should begin during game playback.

title: Seek FWD to Exit - VOD Archive
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
Device is connected to wireless network
User is logged in
custom_steps:
Steps
Select Today's Games
Select any VOD Game
Press the right d-pad and fast forward to the end of the game
custom_expected: THEN the video will pause at end of video And when user resumes playback at regular speed the video player will transition from playback and return to the Schedule (asset) page gracefully

title: Moving forward and back through game Milestones
custom_preconds: VOD game is playing
custom_steps:
Press the down d-pad 
Observe the Milestone bar appears
Press right d-pad
Observe the Game moves forward to the next Milestone
Press the left d-pad
Observe the Game moves to the previous Milestone
custom_expected:
Navigation should move through game as expected.
Correct Inning should be displayed on Milestones

title: Scrubbing forward and back through VOD Game
custom_preconds: VOD Game is playing
custom_steps:
Press the right d-pad 
Observe the Game fast forwards up to 3x speed
Press the left d-pad
Observe the Game rewinds up to 3x speed
custom_expected: Navigation should move Game as expected.

title: Time Zone Checking
custom_preconds:
Device TimeZone is not set to automatic
MLB.tv App is available on device
custom_steps:
Set the Device TimeZone to New York
Launch the app
Check Today's Games to ensure that scheduled start time is correct.
Select Team by Team 
Select a team -> Check recent and Upcoming games are displayed properly
Select Games Recaps -> Check all Games show with correct Date

Repeat the above steps for 6 Time zones around the world.
custom_expected:
All Game start times and game schedules should appear correctly.
Behavior of the App should not change

title: Verify Audio Feed during Live Game
custom_preconds:
MLB.TV App is available on device
User is logged in
custom_steps:
1.  Select Today's Games
2.  Select any Live Game
3.  Take note of the Audio Feeds available (Home Vs Guest)
4.  Begin Video playback
5.  Long press Select button to bring up Extras menu
6.  Select Audio
7.  Listen to each of the Audio feeds for the call sign of the Radion station
custom_expected:
User should See
English
Spanish 
English Radio

English Radio and Spanish should correspond to the Audio feeds noted in Step 2.  (Will need to listen to the audio feeds to hear the call sign of the station)

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
custom_preconds:
Set the Network Emulator
Follow the document: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/JTS/pages/4696660/Network+Emulator+Test+For+Connected+Devices
VOD or Live Game is playing
custom_steps:
Follow the document for App Performance & Stress Testing Due to Network Changes
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/QAspace/pages/14123103/App+Performance+Stress+Testing+Due+to+Network+Changes
custom_expected: Intention of this test is to avoid crashes, video freezing issues, pixelation and watch the video without any lag.

title: Video Playback: Connection Lost
custom_preconds: VOD or Live Game is playing
custom_steps: Disconnect internet connection
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears
